subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Bob and Mike Bryan have played in the BNP Paribas Open 15 times but have yet to win the tournament, which has a doubles field stacked with top singles players.
snippet: Bob and Mike Bryan have played in the BNP Paribas Open 15 times but have yet to win the tournament, which has a doubles field stacked with top singles players.
